acceptanceCriteria: npm run build produces dist/ folder
evidenceLinks: Astro v5.1.7 initialized with TypeScript strict mode
features.notes: Use latest Astro version. Enable TypeScript for better DX. This is the foundation for everything else.
Use official Astro Tailwind integration. Configure content paths for src/**/*.{astro,md,mdx}. Avoid CDN for production.

features.description: Configure base path for GitHub Pages project site
evidenceLinks: astro.config.mjs configured with site and base path /readme for GitHub Pages project deployment
features.notes: Critical for project Pages deployment. Use import.meta.env.BASE_URL for dynamic links. Test thoroughly - base path issues are common.

features.description: Create BaseLayout with header, sidebar, main, footer structure
acceptanceCriteria: Responsive - works on mobile and desktop
evidenceLinks: Footer components. Uses semantic HTML and Tailwind for responsive layout
features.notes: This is the shared layout for all pages. Sidebar should be collapsible on mobile. Use semantic HTML (header, nav, main, footer).

evidenceLinks: Home page index.astro uses BaseLayout and displays welcome content
features.notes: Initial home page - will be enhanced later to show latest notes. For now just needs to render correctly with the layout.

evidenceLinks: Notes index page at /notes/ uses BaseLayout and is ready for content collection integration
features.notes: Initial notes index - will be enhanced to list notes from content collection. For now just needs basic structure.

evidenceLinks: Content collection for pages with Zod schema (title
order). Dynamic route generates pages at /<slug>/
features.notes: Use Astro Content Collections API. Define Zod schema for front matter validation. Pages are evergreen docs like About, Projects.

evidenceLinks: Content collection for notes with Zod schema (title
description). Dynamic route generates pages at /notes/<slug>/
features.notes: Notes are dated entries. Date is required unlike pages. Support optional tags array for future filtering.

acceptanceCriteria: ToC responsive - hidden on mobile or in drawer
evidenceLinks: ArticleLayout.astro created with Toc component. Headings extracted from markdown and displayed in right sidebar (hidden on mobile with lg:block). Sticky positioning at top.
features.notes: ToC should extract headings from rendered content. Use IntersectionObserver for active section highlighting (optional but nice). Consider sticky positioning.

features.description: Generate sidebar navigation from content collections
evidenceLinks: Sidebar.astro dynamically generates navigation from pages collection. Pages sorted by order field. Home and Notes are fixed
pages section shows all content collection pages.
features.notes: Sidebar should be derived from content collections, not hardcoded. Consider supporting explicit order via front matter. Mobile: hamburger menu or slide-out drawer.

features.description: Display latest notes on home page
evidenceLinks: Home page displays 5 latest notes with title
date. Links to full note and all notes index
features.notes: Query notes collection sorted by date. Consider Card component for note previews. Keep it simple - title, date, maybe first paragraph.

features.description: Notes index page lists all notes
evidenceLinks: Notes index at /notes/ lists all notes sorted by date (newest first) with title
features.notes: This replaces the placeholder notes index. Query all notes from collection. Consider grouping by year for long lists.

evidenceLinks: Markdown rendering with Shiki syntax highlighting (github-dark theme). Code blocks in notes render with proper syntax coloring
features.notes: Astro has built-in Markdown support with Shiki. Configure in astro.config.mjs. Ensure heading IDs are URL-friendly for ToC anchors.
Use Tailwind dark mode with class strategy. Add script in head to set theme before render to prevent flash. Consider prefers-color-scheme media query.
Use @tailwindcss/typography for markdown prose. Customize prose colors for dark mode. Ensure code blocks don't overflow on mobile.
Consider CSS-only solution or minimal JS. Ensure keyboard accessibility. Test on actual mobile viewport.
Goal is Stitch export compatibility. Keep classes semantic. Avoid inline styles. Document any custom theme extensions in tailwind.config.

features.description: GitHub Actions workflow for Pages deployment
features.notes: Use official Astro GitHub Pages deploy guide. Set permissions for GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider using pnpm or npm based on project setup.
Astro is static by default which is good. Verify no accidental client-side JS. Check bundle sizes. Test dist/ locally with preview command.
Add after MVP baseline is stable. Pagefind indexes at build time. Consider search UI placement - header or dedicated page. Test with real content.
Use lychee, linkinator, or similar. Run after build step. Consider allowing external link failures as warnings only. Critical for maintaining site quality.

acceptanceCriteria: Tags page lists all available tags
features.notes: Optional MVP+ feature. Implement only after core notes functionality works. Consider tag cloud or simple list.
Optional nice-to-have. Use @astrojs/rss package. Generate at build time. Include in site footer/header.

acceptanceCriteria: Note any inline styles or custom CSS files
evidenceLinks: Stitch export inspected. Single index.html with complete article template. Uses Tailwind CDN (needs replacement)
Material Symbols icons. No local assets folder. Custom colors and dark mode support.
features.notes: First step before integration. Create a checklist of what needs to be migrated. Look for index.html, article.html, notes.html patterns.

features.description: Copy Stitch assets into Astro public folder
evidenceLinks: No assets folder in Stitch export. External images only (Google user avatar). Not applicable for this project.
features.notes: Assets in public/ are served at root. Update any Stitch HTML that used relative ./assets paths to absolute /assets paths.

evidenceLinks: BaseLayout updated with Stitch design: Inter/JetBrains Mono fonts
features.notes: Take Stitch index.html body and convert to Astro layout. Replace page-specific content with <slot />. Keep all Tailwind classes exactly as exported.

evidenceLinks: backdrop blur. Sidebar: Styled with Stitch classes
no-scrollbar. Footer: Simplified with Stitch borders/colors. ToC: XL-only display
features.notes: Copy Stitch markup blocks verbatim into components. Only parameterize what needs to be dynamic. Don't over-componentize.

features.description: Convert Stitch article page to ArticleLayout.astro
evidenceLinks: ArticleLayout updated to match Stitch design with same structure as BaseLayout. Includes fonts
ToC in right sidebar. Matches Stitch article page aesthetic.
features.notes: ArticleLayout is for markdown content pages. Extract article-specific structure from Stitch article.html. ToC goes in right rail.

features.description: Remove Tailwind CDN from Stitch layouts
evidenceLinks: No Tailwind CDN in layouts. Using local Tailwind build via @tailwindcss/vite. Custom theme configured in tailwind.config.mjs with Stitch colors and fonts.
features.notes: Critical: CDN must be removed for production. Tailwind must scan all .astro, .md files. Verify no missing utility classes after removal.

evidenceLinks: Google Fonts configured in BaseLayout: Inter (display font) and JetBrains Mono (monospace). Material Symbols Outlined for icons. Preconnect links added for performance.
features.notes: Keep Google Fonts links from Stitch. Add preconnect for fonts.googleapis.com and fonts.gstatic.com. Self-hosting is optional MVP+.

and tags. Matches Stitch card aesthetic.
features.notes: Used for note previews on home page and notes index. Extract card/list-item pattern from Stitch notes.html or listing.html.

evidenceLinks: Site visually matches Stitch design: Inter/JetBrains Mono fonts
